update magazines
M_Name=#{M_Name},
M_Price=#{M_Price},
M_Type=#{M_Type},
M_Cycle=#{M_Cycle},
M_Introduce =#{M_Introduce},
M_ImgUrl=#{M_ImgUrl},
where M_Id=#{M_ID}
mapper.select: select a.M_Id as M_ID, a.M_Name as M_Name, a.M_Price as M_Price, b.T_Name as M_Type, c.C_Name as M_Cycle, a.M_Introduce as M_Introduce, a.M_ImgUrl as M_ImgUrl FROM magazines a, m_type b, m_cycle c where a.M_Type = b.T_Id and a.M_Cycle = c.C_Id limit #{start} , #{size}

select b.M_Id as M_ID, b.M_Name as M_Name, b.M_Price as M_Price, c.T_Name as M_Type, count(*) as M_Cycle , sum(b.M_Price) as M_Introduce, b.M_ImgUrl as M_ImgUrl from sell_from a, magazines b, m_type c where b.M_Type = c.T_Id and b.M_Id = a.F_M_Id GROUP BY b.M_Id
select M_Id as M_ID, M_Name as M_Name, M_Price as M_Price, M_Type as M_Type, M_Cycle as M_Cycle, M_Introduce as M_Introduce, M_ImgUrl as M_ImgUrl FROM magazines where M_Id = #{id}

select a.Pre_Id as id, b.M_Name as name, c.account as account, a.Pre_add_Date as date,a.Pre_state as state from shopping_cart a, magazines b, users c where a.Pre_M_Id=b.M_Id and a.Pre_U_Id= c.account limit #{start}, #{size}
select SUM(b.M_Price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id and day (a.F_Date)= Day (#{date})
select SUM(b.M_Price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id GROUP BY YEAR (F_Date)
select SUM(b.M_Price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id and DATE_FORMAT(a.F_Date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')

update admintable
passwd=#{passwd},
limits=#{limits},
headerImg=#{headerImg},
where Admin=#{admin}
mapper.select: select a.F_Date as dat, sum(b.M_price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id group by a.F_Date order by a.F_Date
select a.F_Date as dat, sum(b.M_price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id and a.F_M_Id=#{id} group by a.F_Date order by a.F_Date
select a.F_BuyerId as name, sum(b.M_price) as dat from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id group by a.F_BuyerId order by sum(b.M_price) desc limit 10
select a.F_Id, a.F_BuyerId, b.M_Name as F_M_Id, a.F_Date from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id and a.F_BuyerId = #{Id} limit #{start},10
select b.M_Name as dat, sum(b.M_price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id group by a.F_M_Id order by sum(b.M_price) desc limit 55
select c.T_Name as dat, sum(b.M_Price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b, m_type c where b.M_Type = c.T_Id and b.M_Id = a.F_M_Id group by c.T_Name order by sum(b.M_price) desc
select a.F_Date as dat, sum(b.M_price) as money from sell_from a, magazines b where a.F_M_Id = b.M_Id and b.M_Type=#{type} group by a.F_Date order by a.F_Date limit 30
